QUERY.TITLE: Unexploded World_War_II Bombs
QUERY.DESC: Find reports on findings of unexploded bombs , land_mines or other munitions left over from the Second_World_War .
QUERY.NARR: Relevant documents must specify the location in which unexploded bombs or other munitions left over from World_War_II have been found . Details on measures for excavation of the areas concerned and the actions of bomb disposal units are also of interest . Reports on known official munition dumps are not pertinent .
